    RecommendationRunner<U,I>

    public class FilterRecommendationRunner<U,I>
extends AbstractRecommendationRunner<U,I>
    Filter runner. It creates recommendations by using the filter method in the recommenders.

        Parameters:
        users - target users, those for which recommendations are generated.
        format - output recommendation format
        userFilter - item filter provider for each user
        maxLength - maximum length of the recommendation lists, 0 for no limit
